column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////After day 3 of my first year of Houston sinus issues
column2: I stumbled across this place after typing "soup" into the search field on Yelp. I decided not to order until I got there
column3: not paying attention to the Midtown address and the fact that it was a weekend evening
column4: and upon arrival was greeted by a trendy
column6: crawling with a line of people out the door.
